topics.body:
So I just had a thought. Remember the whole Danid Goyer fiasco about a month ago? The whole "She-Hulk" thing? When is Marvel Studios gonna make a She-Hulk movie? Enough people were pissed off at Goyer for Marvel to realize people like Shulky and enough people were disappointed in the Ant-man debacle. I mean they're already making movies for Doctor Strange and Ms. Marvel. Why not She-Hulk?

TL;DR: She-Hulk movie when?!
